snippet: An appeals court upheld the conviction and life sentence of a Nigerian man who tried to blow up a Detroit-bound airliner with a bomb in his underwear in 2009.
abstract: Appeals court upholds conviction and life sentence of Umar Farouk Abdulmutallab, Nigerian man who tried to blow up Detroit-bound airline with bomb in his underwear in 2009.
lead_paragraph: An appeals court upheld the conviction and life sentence of a Nigerian man who tried to blow up a Detroit-bound airliner with a bomb in his underwear in 2009.
